meanings.definition: The outer boundary of a circle.
meanings.sent1: The circumferences of the circle were clearly marked.
meanings.sent2: She measured the circumferences of the circle to find its diameter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran along the circumferences of the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The circumferences of the circle held the secrets of its perfect symmetry.
meanings.sent5: The bright red ribbon followed the circumferences of the gift box.

meanings.sent1: He calculated the circumferences of the circles for his math homework.
meanings.sent2: The runner completed the race by running along the circumferences of the track.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat chased its tail along the circumferences of the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed along the circumferences of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the wind followed the circumferences of the canyon.

meanings.sent1: The teacher explained how to find the circumferences of different circles.
meanings.sent2: The children drew shapes with different circumferences on the board.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy rolled around the circumferences of the rug.
meanings.sent4: The circumferences of the pond shimmered in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers lingered along the circumferences of the garden.
